title: Adults who used alternative medicine treatments U.S. 2021 | Statista
author: John Elflein; Oct
description: In 2021, around 24 percent of adults in the United States reported using herbal medicines, supplements or teas to treat health problems, while around 10 percent reported using non-prescribed drugs such as marijuana and psychedelics as alternative medicines.
